Articles.Content:
More of a request, really.

I just bought a KSP gift code from the SQUAD store for my cousin's son, so now I want to put it in a Christmas card so I can give it as a present. But rather than just a boring, blank letter, I was thinking it'd be cool if there was some sort of KSP - themed image or card template I could use to help make him more excited about the game. I was imagining, some letter-sized printable graphic or collage with rockets, explosions & the like with some room for text (download link / instructions would be a plus).

Anything similar around like that already?

- Drewscriver
